channel.title: Mississippi on HowIsJT
channel.description: Recent content in Mississippi on HowIsJT

item.title: Camping in South Mississippi
item.description: Mississippi offers several beautiful campgrounds within an easy drive of Baton Rouge. South Mississippi All of my tent camping experience in Mississippi has been in the southern part of the state. It’s a reasonably short drive from my home in Baton Rouge. Clear Springs in Homochitto Forest Clear Springs campground is a hidden gem. Forest camping is terrific here surrounding this beautiful reservoir and facilities constructed during the Works Progress Administration.
